body: Altered Form (Change), Blizzard (Weather), Complex Order (Command), Dimensional Hop (Teleportation), Far Sight (Divination), Fire Blast (Fire), Force Armor (Armor), Glimmering (Illusion), Lightning Blast (Electricity), Paralyze Humanoid (Binding), Servitor III (Summoning), Soar (Flight), Sunshine (Illumination), Suppress* (Dispelling), Torture (Pain), Translate (Language), Undeath (Death), Wind Blast (Weather), Wind Wall (Wall)
